thread.title: Someone Allegedly Inside Donald Trump's White House Staff Is Spilling The Tea On Twitter! You HAVE To See This!
thread.title_full: Someone Allegedly Inside Donald Trump's White House Staff Is Spilling The Tea On Twitter! You HAVE To See This!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Someone Allegedly Inside Donald Trump's White House Staff Is Spilling The Tea On Twitter! You HAVE To See This!
text:
2/02/2017 5:44   Conspiracy Corner • Tech Talk • Twitter • Viral: News 
The tweet is coming from inside the White House… Allegedly. 
Now that Donald Trump is in charge, the White House seems to be drained of all its sane-minded staffers only to be left with alternative facts-spewing goons like Kellyanne Conway and Sean Spicer . 
But apparently, the Capitol still has some anonymous allies that claim to be "the unofficial resistance team inside the White House" — and they're tweeting out all of Drumpf's precious secrets! 
Related: Did Trump Really Change Black History Month To African American History Month? 
Though the Twitter account is by no means verified, the @RoguePOTUSStaff page has gone viral after sending alleged inside information from Trump's administration. 
The Rogue POTUS Staff accuses Trump of making racist remarks about Muslims, of "getting payments from foreign governments," and even claims the predatory prez was overheard yelling: 
"Don't they know I'm the fucking President!?" 
The account was created because of the President's own penchant for using a private Twitter account, which they explained in an early tweet: 
We've decided that if POTUS can tweet from a non government then so can we. https://t.co/y6OOGOPXQv — Rogue POTUS Staff (@RoguePOTUSStaff) January 26, 2017 
While none of the intel is confirmed, it's not hard to imagine every word of these quotes coming straight from Trump's b-hole mouth. 
The Rogue team also alleges POTUS is "easily manipulated with smooth compliments" and had been inquiring about staffers' Photoshop skills because the "inauguration photos need to be ‘touched up.'" Ha! 
Ch-ch-check out some tweets from the Rogue account (below) to see insider info on Russia, Trump's family, and some shady behavior from Paul Ryan ! 
POTUS asking around about people's Photoshop skills. Says inauguration photos need to be "touched up." — Rogue POTUS Staff (@RoguePOTUSStaff) January 27, 2017 
Kellyanne is a touchy one herself. Hides it better than POTUS, though. Those two, a match made in heaven. — Rogue POTUS Staff (@RoguePOTUSStaff) January 26, 2017 
When well intended patriots disagree, that's democracy. When POTUS says it's not fact until he approves it, that's tyranny. — Rogue POTUS Staff (@RoguePOTUSStaff) January 26, 2017 
POTUS son-in-law tapped as advisor. Appears Kushner's assignment is to advise POTUS how govt can aid Trump Organization's profit margins. — Rogue POTUS Staff (@RoguePOTUSStaff) January 27, 2017 
Nobody's really sure who's in charge. POTUS is easily manipulated with smooth compliments. Spkr. Ryan is pulling some strings. — Rogue POTUS Staff (@RoguePOTUSStaff) January 26, 2017 
The White House is "a little drab for what I'm used to" according to POTUS. Been going out of his way to inform folks. — Rogue POTUS Staff (@RoguePOTUSStaff) January 26, 2017 
POTUS seems to honestly think Putin is his friend. Says Russia will "fight with us when the time comes" against Iran. #thatsnothowthisworks — Rogue POTUS Staff (@RoguePOTUSStaff) February 2, 2017 
POTUS angry at hearing about Arnold S reply to pray-for-ratings dig. "I won! If I don't know how to be Pres then how come I won?" — Rogue POTUS Staff (@RoguePOTUSStaff) February 2, 2017 
Scariest of all is this reveal that not only did Trump intend for his executive immigration order to be a "Muslim ban" — he and Steve Bannon allegedly don't think the controversial act goes far enough! 
"Ban" is the exact term used during creation of #MuslimBan Exec. Order. POTUS and Bannon want a stronger ban than final product. https://t.co/Aqk7j0RGS7 — Rogue POTUS Staff (@RoguePOTUSStaff) February 1, 2017 
Scary stuff! 
What do U think? Is this account legit or just fake news? Comment below!!
